languages.text: "Ха! Потешная шутка!.. Он{mf||а} же шутит, да?" {n}Ульфар ловит ваш взгляд, и радость испаряется с его лица.{/n} "Яйца ледяного тролля, ты не шутишь!"
"Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"
languages.original_text: "Ха! Потешная шутка!.. Он{mf||а} же шутит, да?" {n}Ульфар ловит ваш взгляд, и радость испаряется с его лица.{/n} "Яйца ледяного тролля, ты не шутишь!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「はっ！ただの冷やかしだ！冗談に決まってる、よな？」{n}ウルファーがあなたの目を捉えると、愉快げな表情が消える。{/n}「ふざけるなよ、冗談じゃないだと！」
languages.original_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"

traits.locale_text: 「はっ！ただの冷やかしだ！冗談に決まってる、よな？」{n}ウルファーがあなたの目を捉えると、愉快げな表情が消える。{/n}「ふざけるなよ、冗談じゃないだと！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “哈！真好笑！{mf|他|她}是在开玩笑，没错吧？”{n}乌尔法对上你的目光，脸上的笑容消失了。{/n}“巨魔的卵蛋啊，你居然是认真的！”
languages.original_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"

traits.locale_text: “哈！真好笑！{mf|他|她}是在开玩笑，没错吧？”{n}乌尔法对上你的目光，脸上的笑容消失了。{/n}“巨魔的卵蛋啊，你居然是认真的！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ha ! Voilà ce que j'appelle une plaisanterie ! Car {mf|il|elle} plaisante, n'est-ce pas ? {n}Ulfar croise votre regard et toute trace de gaîté s'évanouit de son visage.{/n} Par les couilles de tous les trolls, vous ne plaisantez pas ! »
languages.original_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Voilà ce que j'appelle une plaisanterie ! Car {mf|il|elle} plaisante, n'est-ce pas ? {n}Ulfar croise votre regard et toute trace de gaîté s'évanouit de son visage.{/n} Par les couilles de tous les trolls, vous ne plaisantez pas ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ja! ¡Muy buena esa! Estará de broma, ¿no?». {n}Ulfar te echa el ojo y el humor se evapora de su cara.{/n} «La trol que {mf|le|la} parió... ¡que no está de broma!».
languages.original_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja! ¡Muy buena esa! Estará de broma, ¿no?». {n}Ulfar te echa el ojo y el humor se evapora de su cara.{/n} «La trol que {mf|le|la} parió... ¡que no está de broma!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ha! Ein schöner Witz! {mf|Er|Sie} scherzt doch, oder?" {n}Als Ulfar deinem Blick begegnet, schwindet jeglicher Humor aus seiner Stimme.{/n} "Bei den Eiern eines Trolls ... Ihr scherzt nicht!"
languages.original_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Ein schöner Witz! {mf|Er|Sie} scherzt doch, oder?" {n}Als Ulfar deinem Blick begegnet, schwindet jeglicher Humor aus seiner Stimme.{/n} "Bei den Eiern eines Trolls ... Ihr scherzt nicht!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Hah! Kaliteli esprinin de hâli başka oluyor! Şaka yapıyor, değil mi?" {n}Sana bakan Ulfar'ın gülümsemesi siliniyor.{/n} "Troller beni alsın, ciddisin sen!"
languages.original_text: "Ha! A fine jest! {mf|He|She} is joking, yes?" {n}Ulfar catches your eye, and the humour evaporates from his face.{/n} "Troll balls, you're not joking!"
